polish_switch.description: Polish the faucet switch for a shiny finish.

check_rotation.description: Check if the switch of the faucet rotates smoothly.

wipe_switch.description: Wipe the faucet switch to remove any dirt or grime.

check_switch_status.description: Check the status of the faucet switch.

turn_switch.description: Turn the switch of the faucet to either open or close it.

swipe_switch.description: Swipe the switch to remove any dirt or dust.

confirm_switch.description: Confirm the status of the switch and make sure there are no further actions required.

rotate_switch.description: Rotate the sink faucet switch to adjust the water flow.

press_switch.description: Press the sink faucet switch to control the water flow.

clean_switch.description: Clean the switch of the faucet to ensure smooth operations.

confirm_switch_status.description: Confirm that no tasks need to be done with the switch.

check_faucet_base.description: Check the faucet base for any cracks or leaks.

polish_faucet_base.description: Polish the faucet base for a clean and shiny finish.

clean_faucet_base.description: Clean the faucet base to remove any dirt or deposits.

confirm_faucet_base_status.description: Confirm the status of the faucet base.

wipe_faucet_base.description: Wipe the base to remove any dirt or dust.

confirm_base_status.description: Confirm the status of the faucet base.

clean_base.description: Clean the base area of the sink faucet to maintain cleanliness.

confirm_base.description: Ensure the stability of the sink faucet base to maintain stability.

ensure_spout_clean.description: Ensure the faucet spout is clean for hygienic water flow.

check_spout.description: Check the spout for any leaks or blockages.

clean_spout.description: Clean the faucet spout to ensure proper water flow.

confirm_spout_status.description: Confirm the status of the faucet spout.

status_spout.description: Check the status of the sink faucet spout to ensure it's functioning properly.

check_overall_faucet.description: Check the overall condition of the faucet including the switch, base, and spout.

polish_faucet.description: Polish the entire faucet with a cloth for a shiny finish.

check_and_clean.description: Check the entire faucet for any issues and clean it thoroughly.

ensure_hygienic_condition_faucet.description: Ensure the faucet is in a hygienic condition by cleaning it thoroughly.

clean_entire_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet, including the base, switch, and spout.

clean_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet including the switch, base, and spout.

control_water_flow.description: Turn the faucet switch for controlling the water flow then clean each faucet component.

confirm_faucet_status.description: Confirm the status of the faucet.

whole_faucet.description: Maintain the overall cleanliness of the entire sink.

rotate_and_clean.description: Rotate the faucet switch and clean the entire sink for proper functioning.

confirm_general_status.description: Confirm that no tasks need to be done with the faucet in general.

clean_all.description: Simultaneous cleanup of all components of the faucet.

complete_faucet_status.description: Confirm that no tasks need to be done with the faucet.

clean_whole_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet including the switch, base, and spout.
